metadata.title: CVE-2024-43877 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: pci: ivtv: Add check for DMA map resultIn case DMA fails, 'dma->SG_length' is 0. This value is later used toaccess 'dma->SGarray[dma->SG_length - 1]', which will cause out ofbounds access.Add check to return early on invalid value. Adjust warnings accordingly.Found by Linux Verification Center (linuxtesting.org) with SVACE.
